data.description_html:
This improvement on Nybor's gentle reminder causes intense pain in the subject.
The subject is dazed for 1d4 rounds and suffers a -2 penalty on attacks, saving throws, and most checks while the spell lasts; however, the subject also receives a +2 circumstance bonus to Strength.
Focus: A pointed stick at least 1 foot long.
data.name: Nybor's Mild Admonishment
